lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy will do jigsaw puzzles to kill the time before the opening round at the Masters on Thursday, but finding the final piece to a career grand slam is upper-most on the Northern Irishman's mind.

headline.print_headline: McIlroy Searches for Final Piece of Grand Slam Puzzle
headline.main: McIlroy Searches for Final Piece of Grand Slam Puzzle

snippet: Rory McIlroy will do jigsaw puzzles to kill the time before the opening round at the Masters on Thursday, but finding the final piece to a career grand slam is upper-most on the Northern Irishman's mind....
